name: Performance Issue
about: Report and track performance problems in the Android app
title: "[Perf] - "
labels: performance
assignees: ""
---

## Scenario
Describe when/where the performance issue happens (e.g., scrolling list, launching activity, switching tabs).

## Baseline metrics
What was observed? (FPS drops, ANR, memory usage, startup time, etc.)

## Expected performance
What should the target or acceptable performance be?

## Steps to reproduce
1. Open app
2. Perform action '...'
3. Observe slowdown / lag

## Profiling / traces
Attach logs, profiler output (Android Studio Profiler, Systrace, etc.), or screenshots.

## Hypothesis / plan
What might be causing the issue? Any ideas on possible fixes?
